reviewText: please I have to buy this movie,richie castellano (castaldo)was my boyfriend,he passed away april 5 easter sunday.i still cant get over the fact that I will never see him again.no matter what people said about I still loved him with my whole heart.i am trying to get a copy of all the films he made for me only.i will not show anyone just me.i would never forget you if you did this for me.  thank you so much Brenda delissio

Joseph Rigano from my favorite Casino does a great job on playing Tommy Sapiro the local crime boss who plots against degenerate gambler Bobby Venuti(Richard C. Castellano) and Vinny Vella does god as sally Bugs the hot-tempered underboss of Tommy Sapiro. Gene Ruffini from Casino plays the banker who gets "Whacked." If you like GoodFellas and Casino buy this one!
